reqsimile.data
Class ReqData

java.lang.Object
  reqsimile.data.ReqData
public class ReqData
extends java.lang.Object

ReqData holds all the requirements data used. It is used by ReqDataModel to present all or a subset of the available information.

Since:
1.4.2
Author:
Johan Natt och Dag
See Also:
ReqDataModel

getValueSetAt

public java.util.Collection getValueSetAt(int row,
                                          java.util.Collection cols)
Returns specified cell values from a particular row in the data set. The cell contents are put in a Collection object.

Parameters:
row - A row in the data set
cols - The names of the columns for which values are returned
Returns:
The Collection of cell contents

getValuesAt

public java.lang.String getValuesAt(int row,
                                    java.util.Collection cols)
Returns specified cell values from a particular row in the data set. The cell contents are concatenated with a space between each cell's content.

Parameters:
row - The row to fetch
cols - The names of the columns for which values are returned
Returns:
The concatenated contents of (row, cols)
